title: Ashoka vs PES EC for cs AI ML
content:
I'm currently facing a tough decision between Ashoka University and PES University for pursuing cs. I'm really torn because while I value the potential for strong career prospects after graduation (which PES seems to offer), I also want to ensure I have a fulfilling college life that includes my passions for sports and theatre. Has anyone here attended either university or faced a similar decision? I would greatly appreciate any insights or advice you could share to help me make an informed choice.

Thanks in advance!

comments.body: I was in a similar dilemma while choosing between Manipal CSE and PES CSE 3 years ago and regretted my decision within a few months I'd say choose college with a more liberal environment, at this point I'm not sure what I learned from the college itself other than being highly competitive and apathetic towards other people.

hmm! i completely agree, but the issue is ashoka is double the fee at pes with not as good placements + bsc degree. so my parents are obv leaning towards the safer bet which is pes, but I want to go to ashoka not just for the learning method but the environment & exposure...
If you're leaning towards a safer option then ofc PES is promising in terms of placements but placements depend on your capabilities rather than the college.
